text: Hi <@U7SL518D6>, they are an example of a client who are becoming increasingly confident with doing things such as cloning templates and re-arranging/removing things, I think the new Drag and drop process will be perfect for them but concerned that initially they will feel like something is being taken away from them
Thanks <@U26DA9CQ0>, ultimately I just need to get in there and play with the new process but until I can do that I'm trying to sound like I know what I'm walking about :sweat_smile:
Morning, how do I go about adding a subscribe section within blog listing page like on HubSpots website?
Im afraid i don't, and don't think we publicly document that.

Hi All - I'm looking for an easy way to change the background color of the text fields in a HubSpot form. Seems like there is no easy way to change from the default white color. Any help would be greatly appreciated
